adultos não tem.

comments.text:

nada é combinado pode ter certeza, os caras são muito bons mesmo:
http://citecum.com.br/improfest/

comments.text:
+Guilherme Estevam  Cara tem uma grande diferença entre burrice e não 
entendimento, na burrice vc sabe do fato, o compreende e faz uma grande 
merda com a sua interpretação. Qualquer pessoa "normal" teria compreendido 
a humilde duvida do Muriel mas vc conseguiu ser mais arrogante do que o bom 
senso exigido. Na boa não vamos tornar um excelente canal de humor um alvo 
 para esta agressividade e desrespeito sem motivo. O nosso dia dia já é 
repleto disso. Grato!  Parabéns Muriel!
comments.author: Marcos Leal

captions.text:
You wrote scene suggestions
that are in this red box,

I'll read them, and whoever has an idea
with them will step ahead and do it.

For instance:
'Worst ways to call the waiter'.

Dude, you should ask
for a Sub Zero beer!
'How not to change a light bulb'

- The light bulb burned out.
- Change!

'Possible conversation between
the plug and the socket'

- Me! - Guys, there's enough for everyone,
I'm Multi-Plug Adaptor, nice to meet you.

'New ways to know the
periodic table by heart'

- Your table is heartwarming!
- Thank you!

- You should put golden paint in gold!
- Thanks!

Because of the new law, we will
change Brazil's soccer team.

The player's names
will be replaced by...

- The striker will be...
- I'm... Helium!

- Helium! In the midfield, we have him!
- Strontium!

- In the sidelines, as usual...
- Phosphorus, man!

'Worst things to read on
a note on your bedside'

'Improve your bedside manners.
Sincerely, bedside table'.
'The night was amazing. You were great'.

Hi! I'm Beto, but you can
call me Multi-Plug Adaptor!

'Welcome to the world of AIDS.
This bed is infected with HIV'.

'Now... Pass it on to 10 friends
or Jesus will be mad at you'...

'For every person you pass it on,
one dollar will be donated to charity'.
'But if you don't pass it to anyone'...

Come on, is Beto
passing on chain letters?

- All right, ladies and gentlemen.
- Have you ever got this one?

Some guy goes to the movies and
supposedly sits on a needle, that somehow

has a string attached to it with a paper
that says 'welcome to the world of AIDS'.

- No, he wasn't at the movies.
He was at a play. - Yeah!

WATCH POLITICAL CAMPAIGN
RICARDO REIS / ÁLVARO CAMPOS

WATCH MORE
IMPROVÁVEL / WITH FÁBIO / WITH ALLAN / IMPROBABLE SCENES

WATCH MORE
SKETCHES 1ST SEASON / EM BREVES
